content: * *Marine Parade Constituency** was a single-member constituency in [Marine Parade](/wiki/Marine_Parade), Singapore. It was formed in 1976 after the land reclamation works to build Marine Parade were completed and carved out from [Joo Chiat Constituency](/wiki/Joo_Chiat_Constituency). [Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong) made his political debut in the constituency when it was formed in 1976. He would later become the second [Prime Minister of Singapore](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore). In 1988, the constituency was merged into [Marine Parade Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Marine_Parade_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty**1976**[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1980****1984** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1970s [General Election 1976](/wiki/1976_Singaporean_general_election): Marine Parade PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)14,41878.62[UF](/wiki/United_Front_(Singapore))Monsor Rahman3,92221.38[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)10,49657.24[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)18,77996.2[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1980](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election): Marine Parade PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)[Walkover](/wiki/Walkover)[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)21,903[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))[General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election): Marine Parade PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)15,22870.93[SUF](/wiki/Singapore_United_Front)De Gracias Gertrude M6,24229.07[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)8,98641.86[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)22,20694.0[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))N/A - 1984 General Election's result - 1980 General Election's result - 1976 General Election's result This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub.
